channel.title: Comments on: GameSpy: An Interview with Ninjas

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
Whats funny (or sad, depending on your outlook) about my server is that the days where anyone cared about a ninja are long gone. Usually, the person making the post about a ninja is met with contempt, and is either told to die in a car fire, or simply to stfu and gtfo.
You see, it's their fault for being so noob that they are still running URBS, or that they still have to mess with pickup groups at all. If you're posting about a blue ninja on my server forums, you'd better be prepared to hear "NO ONE CARES".
item.content:encoded:
Whats funny (or sad, depending on your outlook) about my server is that the days where anyone cared about a ninja are long gone. Usually, the person making the post about a ninja is met with contempt, and is either told to die in a car fire, or simply to stfu and gtfo.

You see, it’s their fault for being so noob that they are still running URBS, or that they still have to mess with pickup groups at all. If you’re posting about a blue ninja on my server forums, you’d better be prepared to hear “NO ONE CARES”.
